item.title: Recolouring! ints etc
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok for the last 4 f###ing hours i have been changing the ints in class8 and nothing works
here is an example

(original d pl8)

if(i == 13665){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 43072;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 925;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 4550;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 925;
class8.anInt174 = 27;
class8.anInt181 = 1330;
class8.anInt190 = 310;
class8.anInt198 = 1800;
class8.anInt169 = 0;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt165 = 28;
class8.anInt200 = 28;
class8.anInt164 = 29;
class8.anInt188 = 29;
class8.aBoolean176 = false;
class8.aString170 = “Dragon Platebody”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “Provides excellent protection”.getBytes();
}

and i wanted to change it to gold

if(i == 13888){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];

}
